contest-event.event-date:
June 8, 2014 D West Lothian Festival of Brass
West Lothian Festival of Brass 0 Entertainments Contest West Lothian Challenge west-lothian-challenge
Howden Park Centre, Livingston, West Lothian, Scotland, UK Most Entertaining Performance: Co-operative Funeralcare
Best New Composition/Arrangement: Co-operative Funeralcare You Needed Me (Randy Goodrum arr. Adrian Drover)
Best Section/Ensemble: Co-operative Funeralcare There's A Great Day Coming (Will Thompson arr. Terry Everson / Allan Ramsay)
Best Soloist: Chris Mansfield (trombone) - Kingdom Brass As If We Never Said Goodbye (Andrew Lloyd Webber arr. Bill Geldard)
Best Performance of a Howard Snell Composition/Arrangement: Whitburn Candide Overture (Leonard Bernstein arr. Howard Snell)
June 17, 2014, 2:40 p.m. June 17, 2014, 2:53 p.m.
1 Cooperation Band Allan Ramsay
2 Whitburn Band Lee Skipsey
3 Kingdom Brass Eoin Tonner
4 Kirkintilloch Kelvin Brass Charles Keenan
5 Clackmannan and District Band Paul McKelvie
Withdrawn Kirkintilloch Band Unknown
